long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a beta version and may have some bugs.

Help you export and translate posts Substack site. It works better for podcast transcription post like this: https://www.lennysnewsletter.com/p/how-to-consistently-go-viral-nikita-bier

You need to add your own Gemini API key to use translate feature: https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/api-key

Pin the extension icon and click it when you open a Substack post. View in full width windows. Do not switch to transcript view.

Support export content as markdown and epub.

I will add more sites in the future.
